summary: A rich young lady marries a man without means only because her father tells her it is a way to save millions in income tax each year - by Germany's tax splitting rules for married couples.
cast: Florian Lukas|Diana Amft|Ludger Pistor|Ursula Karusseit|Uwe Preuss|Matthias Weidenh√∂fer|Tabea Bettin|Daniel Aichinger|Helmut Mooshammer|Ronald Marx|Max Gertsch|Patrick Pinheiro
title: Boda por contrato
